chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has a problem:
The phone came with the broken screen I want a new phone
Thank you,

Hi there!

The customer claims that their device was delivered damaged. We have requested pictures of the outside of the package (with damages visible), a picture of the package label with the tracking number visible, a picture of the package showing the item inside, pictures of the packaging of the item received, and pictures of the damaged item (with damages visible) report.


Once we have all the paperwork, we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 1 business day after we've received the documents.


All the best,
Rosalía, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner. We await the relevant images from the customer and will proceed with the necessary actions once we have received them. Thank you for your cooperation. 

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

May we confirm if the customer has left any comments on the delivery note. Please also ask the customer to keep the parcel first because the carrier may still need to conduct some investigations. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare, 
Any update??

Regards,
KW

Hello ecomobile, 

customer hasn't responded, 

We are still waiting for customer pictures, 

I will keep you updated.

Rosalía, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Please inform us once the customer has sent the relevant pictures.

Regards,
RK
